__e: Now, I ask you plainly, does any man need further reason to rise up against a king that would allow such horrors to be carried out in his name?
A boy who would be disappeared from this world until he was old enough to return and lead an uprising against me.
I want to rebel against you, against everything against God, but I'm afraid.
The city is in uproar, and you want to go out for dinner?
They said that a riot had erupted at the prison and that Bob was unaccounted for.
Let others rise to take our place
And they need you two to go in there, remove Kim... embolden them to revolt... and take over.
If I have reason to believe that there's going to be a riot started, and someone tells me there's going to be trouble unless I stop them, it's my duty to stop them.
I have traveled far, in good honor and faith... but I was met by rebellion and war.
